tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE augmented_reality_reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  industry_name VARCHAR(255),
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  report_date DATE,
  adoption_rate FLOAT,
  impact_score FLOAT,
  report_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ImpactReports (
  impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  industry_name VARCHAR(255),
  impact_description TEXT,
  impact_level ENUM('Low', 'Medium', 'High'),
  report_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE adoption_reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  industry VARCHAR(255),
  adoption_rate DECIMAL,
  impact_level VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE industry_details (
  industry_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  industry_name VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
  industry_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ar_technologies (
  ar_tech_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  ar_tech_name VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
  ar_company VARCHAR(255),
  year_of_release INT
)

CREATE TABLE augmented_reality_technologies (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    industry_id UUID,
    technology_name VARCHAR(50),
    adoption_rate FLOAT,
    impact_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE reports (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    industry_id UUID,
    report_title VARCHAR(100),
    report_date DATE,
    report_description TEXT
);
